School Name: SIT Nurul Fikri - Depok Academic Year
Vision: To be a leading Education Institution in guiding the generations.
Kurikulum: In addition to being guided by the National curriculum, SIT Nurul Fikri develops a constructive based curriculum, Islamic value (SMART) curriculum, learning experience-based curriculum, and higher order thinking skills (HOTS) curriculum in order to prepare students to be able to deal with future global challenges. Those curricula are strengthened by a curriculum that reflects the specificity of Nurul Fikri, such as Tahfidzul Qurâ€™an, Arabic, Islamic Personal Development, and Islamic history.
